
#read the data
```{r}
c<-read.csv("/Users/owner/Downloads/Chase0166_Activity_20190810_2.csv",header=T,sep=',')
c$Posting.Date<-as.Date(c$Posting.Date,format="%m/%d/%Y")
```

#split the data into 2018 and 2019
```{r}
c_2018<-c[c$Posting.Date<"2019-01-01" ,]
dim(c_2018)
length(unique(c_2018$Posting.Date))
c_2019<-c[c$Posting.Date>="2019-01-01" ,]
dim(c_2019)
length(unique(c_2019$Posting.Date))
```

#Did I do oil change more often?
```{r}
d<-"VIOC"
print( paste("How many times have I visited ",d))
length(c_2018[grepl(d,c_2018$Description),]$Description)
length(c_2018[grepl(d,c_2018$Description),]$Description)/length(unique(c_2018$Posting.Date))
length(c_2019[grepl(d,c_2019$Description),]$Description)
length(c_2019[grepl(d,c_2019$Description),]$Description)/length(unique(c_2019$Posting.Date))
```

#Did I spend more on car insurance?
```{r}
cg<-c[grepl("GEICO",c$Description),] 
plot(cg$Posting.Date,cg$Amount )
```
